item.title: My Plan
item.description:
My Plan in Five Years

Study

Work hard to learn the knowledge in class, especially try my best in the courses I am good at. In the remaining three years, I will work hard to get on the Dean’s Honor Roll just like I did in my freshman year.

While maintaining the current GPA, work hard to improve it, preferably to 3.8 or above. Must be in the top 35% of my major every year to receive a renewal of my entrance scholarship.

item.title: My Travel Plans
item.description:
My travel Plans

I have traveled to many countries and constantly expanded my horizons. I have been to Asia（including Japan, South Korea, Singapore, Thailand, the Philippines, Malaysia）, Europe（including the United Kingdom, France, Switzerland, Germany, Italy）, the United States, and Australia

I‘d like to go to a Nordic country. I really want to see the scenery there with my own eyes.

In 2025, my parents and I plan to visit another city in the United States that we have not been to. At the same time, I want to visit my good friend who I have been with for more than ten years and is now studying in Los Angeles.

item.title: A volunteer experience
item.description:
Volunteer

On November 24, 2024, I volunteered at the Guangdong-Hong Kong-Macao Road Cycling Race and the 15th National Games Road Cycling Test Race. This is my first time to volunteer at a large-scale event since I came to Macau. I followed the organization and was mainly responsible for cheering for the players at the entrance and exit of the Macau section of the Hong Kong-Zhuhai-Macao Bridge.

Through this volunteer activity, I met some new like-minded friends and learned a lot. The security preparations for the event were quite sufficient, and communication between departments during the competition was also extremely important.
